topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54badc4063687262e0c92100#post_54badc4063687262e0c92100
She fell and broke her ribs a couple days ago
Said she was fine
Then massive pain today 
Went to hospital, got xrays
Now I am at pharmacy picking up morphine 

My family seems to have an issue of admitting they need medical aid

A few years ago, when my oma was still living on her own, she cut herself badly cutting food
She preceded to just wrap it with a cloth, and despite the massive bleeding, continued doing her daily stuff, even going out if I recall correctly, till she just fainted
